title: An option to "Log Out"
body: I honestly feel there should be a way to switch between accounts from the new client. There has always been the option of closing the game, re-launching the game, and then clicking play, just to relog. Why isn't there a feature yet where you can just click "log out" instead of close?

replies.body: Because having more than one account is not allowed in the first place, and will probably be bannable eventually.

I share my computer with people tho. I have some roommates and when i'm heading out they hop on, and when they leave I hop on. Simple stuff like that. I just hate having to completely restart the client. I feel it's a simple feature that could save me 10s of my life a few times a day lol.

Well:
1. Technically having two accounts is not allowed/smurfing
2. It was in the old client a way to log out but i dont see it in the new client
